methods.name: dateStringToTotalTimeString
methods.rawdescription: Converts ISOString date string to its equivalent time in milliseconds since 1970, returns numeric value as a string.

methods.name: getCanonicalUrl
methods.rawdescription:
Generates the canonical categiry or article url.
Note: Do not provide base url, while saving urls to db, but while displaying only.

Provide only when displaying the url, and not while saving to db.

Generates Image source urls to be displayed from API.

methods.name: getStringWithNoSpecialChars
methods.rawdescription: Stripe out all special characters from the string too except A-Z, a-z, 0-9.
methods.description: Stripe out all special characters from the string too except A-Z, a-z, 0-9.

methods.name: getUniqueFromString
methods.rawdescription: Generates a unique ID from a string by adding dashes for spaces and adding a unique string.
methods.description: Generates a unique ID from a string by adding dashes for spaces and adding a unique string.

methods.name: replaceSingleWithDoubleQuotes
methods.rawdescription: Replaces single quotes in a string with double quotes.
methods.description: Replaces single quotes in a string with double quotes.

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.rawdescription: Scrolls the page to the desired top position.
methods.description: Scrolls the page to the desired top position.

methods.name: stripsOutQuotesFromStartAndEnd
methods.rawdescription: Strips out starting and ending single/double quotes from a string.
methods.description: Strips out starting and ending single/double quotes from a string.

methods.name: toDashedString
methods.rawdescription:
Converts a string into dashed string. All spaces are replaced with dashes.
This converted string can be used for getting a unique name for a title of any content like, article etc.
methods.description: Converts a string into dashed string. All spaces are replaced with dashes. This converted string can be used for getting a unique name for a title of any content like, article etc.

methods.name: totalTimeStringToUTCdateString
methods.rawdescription: Converts total time in milliseconds since 1970 (numbered string) to its equivalent ISOString date string.
methods.description: Converts total time in milliseconds since 1970 (numbered string) to its equivalent ISOString date string.

methods.name: trimConsecutiveSpaces
methods.rawdescription: Trims out additional consecutive spaces from a string, also trims spaces from end of the string.
methods.description: Trims out additional consecutive spaces from a string, also trims spaces from end of the string.

injectables.description: UtilsService exports all the methods that provides some common utility.

getSignature.name: currentDate
getSignature.rawdescription: Returns the current Date from browser in the ISO format.

modules.name: AppConfigModule
modules.description: Responsible for adding Library configuration as a provider in the root, so that all library modules can use it, if needed. This module should be imported in App module with .forRoot().
